00009 #ifndef __edtw__PrefixSpotter__
00010 #define __edtw__PrefixSpotter__
00011 
00012 #include <iostream>
00013 #include "PatternSpotter.hpp"
00014 #include "type_defs.h"
00015 #include "basic_structs.hpp"
00016 
00018 typedef struct RefStats {
00019         data_t deltaY;
00020         data_t Syy;
00021         float deltaCoeff;
00022 } RefStats;
00023 
00026 class PrefixSpotter: public PatternSpotter {
00027 
00028 private:
00029         PrefixSpotter& operator=(const PrefixSpotter& other); // no copying
00030 
00031         data_t normalizationFactor;
00032         
00033 protected:
00034         //arrays of precomputed mean(y) and Syy values
00035         RefStats *yStats;
00036         
00037         //best prefix at current time step
00038         idx_t  bestPrefix;
00039         tick_t bestPrefixStartTime;
00040         data_t bestPrefixDistance;
00041         
00042         //prefixes to care about (at present, only used by DDW)
00043         length_t minPrefixLen;
00044         length_t maxPrefixLen;          //TODO dont need to compute prefixes past this
00045         
00046         // remove conflicts in possible subsequences
00047         virtual void purgeAllOverlap(tick_t tstart, tick_t tend) = 0;
00048         virtual void purgeInferiorOverlap(tick_t tstart, tick_t tend, data_t dist) = 0;
00049         
00050         // check if a subsequence is optimal
00051         virtual bool sequenceLocallyOptimal(tick_t te, data_t dist) const = 0;
00052         
00055         data_t normalize(data_t dist) const { return dist / normalizationFactor; }
00056         
00059         data_t denormalize(data_t dist) const { return dist * normalizationFactor;}
00060         
00061 public:
00062         
00063         // -------------------------------
00064         // Overrides from PatternSpotter
00065         // -------------------------------
00066         
00067         // lifecycle
00068         explicit PrefixSpotter(Template const& ref, SpotterParams const& p);
00069         explicit PrefixSpotter(const PrefixSpotter& other);
00070         ~PrefixSpotter();
00071         
00072         // getters
00073         virtual data_t getCurrentDist() const = 0;
00074         virtual tick_t getCurrentStartTime() const = 0;
00075         idx_t  getBestCurrentPrefix() const { return bestPrefix; };
00076         
00077         // setters
00078         void setSameClassMeansOptimal(bool meansOptimal);
00079         void setQueryLenRange(length_t minLen, length_t maxLen) {
00080                 minPrefixLen = minLen;
00081                 maxPrefixLen = maxLen;
00082         }
00083         
00084         // other public functions
00085         virtual void updateMatrix(const tick_t t, const data_t* sample, data_t cutoff) = 0;
00086         virtual bool sequenceLocallyOptimal(Subsequence seq) const;
00087         void purgeAllOverlap(Subsequence seq);
00088         void purgeInferiorOverlap(Subsequence seq);
00089 };
00090 
00091 #endif /* defined(__edtw__PrefixSpotter__) */
